entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the one who has turned pale and is speaking to Amycus. She is described as not backing away from him despite his offensive proximity.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: Amycus is introduced as the one who moves forward and gets close to Professor McGonagall, and later spits in her face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who pulls off his Cloak and raises his wand when Amycus spits in Professor McGonagall's face.

relationships.description: Amycus spat in the face of Professor McGonagall.
Harry cast the Crucio spell on Amycus.
